name: ClawPay
description: Secure card vault with policy-gated payments for AI agents. Your agent asks, the bouncer decides.

require_approval_above.description: Require human approval for payments above this amount

block_above.description: Block payments above this amount entirely

approval_method.description: How to notify user for approval

telegram_bot_token.description: Telegram bot token from @BotFather (required if method is telegram)

telegram_chat_id.description: Telegram chat ID to send approval requests to

whatsapp_chat_id.description: WhatsApp chat ID for approval messages (requires OpenClaw messaging)

approval_timeout.description: Seconds to wait for approval before auto-denying

approval_webhook_url.description: Webhook URL for approval notifications (if method is webhook)
